sobre.descricao: Software Engineer and Clean Code philosophy enthusiast. My professional experience includes the development of full-stack web applications, encompassing back-end, front-end, and data. I have practical knowledge in Python, Django, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.JS, Nest.js, and I work with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server. Additionally, I have experience with front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, and ReactJS.

descricoes.solcard: Work in fintech with focus on blockchain solutions. Responsible for end-to-end development of features, with NestJS APIs and Next.js/Tailwind interfaces, ensuring performance and scalability. Experience in digital transaction integration, external service consumption, and good Git versioning practices.
descricoes.csbtech: Technology consulting for SMEs, working in agile project management, technical team coordination, and scalable solution development. Experience in system architecture, quality monitoring, and integration of CI/CD practices and automation for operational efficiency.
descricoes.finestsolutionsllc: Back-end solution development with focus on RESTful APIs and data scraping systems. Work in system refactoring, ensuring better performance and scalability. Use of modern technologies and databases, with emphasis on Python, data manipulation, and good coding practices.
descricoes.v2consulting1: Implementation of the Manager Bot V2 project, an application that automates the processing and transfer of audio and text files to specific clients. Development of RPA automations, implementation of information security with encryption, MFA and RBAC, and configuration of customizable business rules.
descricoes.v2consulting2: Full-stack development of web application for knowledge base management and corporate training. Creation of back-end, front-end and database management. Use of HTML5, CSS3, JS, ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Jest, Postman and SQL Server.
descricoes.idfbrasil: Complete development of the IDF institutional website, from design to infrastructure. Creation of Python/Django back-end, React/Vite front-end, and deployment on Vercel/Fly, with GitHub versioning.
descricoes.mobly: Refactoring and optimization of post-sales messaging systems integrated with Mercado Livre API. Building Airflow DAGs running on Databricks, using Python (pandas, requests, pyspark).
descricoes.redegazeta: Development of chatbot with Python, TensorFlow and Scikit-learn, integrated with GPT-3.5 model, for querying 10 years of journalistic archive. Implementation of web application in Node.js/Express and front-end in HTML/CSS/JS.
descricoes.v2consulting3: Automation of reports and integrations via Python (requests, pandas, smtplib, xml). Technical support to clients and development of scripts to optimize internal processes.

csblandingpage.descricao: In this project, I was responsible for creating the landing page for CSB Tech, a consulting company specializing in software development. The page was developed with the aim of attracting new customers and partners through a modern and responsive design, highlighting the company's services and values.

csbproject.descricao: In this project, I worked as a tech lead and full-stack developer, acting as front-end, back-end, and database system administrator, in addition to managing the necessary cloud architecture. CSB Project Management is a web application that facilitates the management of CSB consulting projects, allowing the registration of projects, tasks, collaborators, and clients, as well as generating reports and graphs for monitoring and decision-making.

managerbot.descricao: In this project, I was responsible for implementing RPA automations for V2 Consulting. The Manager Bot is a application that automates the processing and transfer of audio and text files for specific clients, using configurable business rules and license-based control. Developed with a focus on security, the system includes multiple encryption mechanisms, multi-factor authentication (MFA), and role-based access control (RBAC).

siteaurora.descricao: In this project, I was responsible for creating the institutional website in 3 languages for Aurora Distribuidora, the only aluminum distributor that uses artificial intelligence in Latin America. The site was developed with the aim of promoting the company's services and attracting partners through a classic and minimalist design, highlighting the organization's values.

siteidfbrasil.descricao: This project consists of creating an institutional website for IDF Brasil, a non-profit organization whose mission is to preserve and conserve Brazilian fauna. The site was developed to promote the organization's actions, attract donations, and promote fauna preservation through accessible and interactive content.

infotecav2consulting.descricao: Complete web application to facilitate the management of content generated by companies, streamlining and facilitating internal communication activities, training, process execution, and workplace monitoring. Infoteca achieves these gains through the management of publications, knowledge tests, and learning paths, in addition to restricting publications to specific groups and roles.

rparelatórioslello.descricao: This project consists of the automation of report extraction for Lello Condomínios, one of the largest condominium management companies in Brazil. The system was developed to enable the daily extraction of more than 10 reports, so that no human interaction is required for the process execution. From extraction to sending to the AWS bucket, everything is done automatically and programmatically.

cybersecinfo.descricao: This project is a web application called Cyber Security Information, developed by me and two other students from IFSP - São Paulo Campus Pirituba. It offers theoretical content, tutorials, and free tools to democratize access to Cybersecurity. The application is accessible on multiple devices and includes accessibility features such as translation to LIBRAS using VLIBRAS. For more details, see the topics below.

athenaweb.descricao: This project, a collaboration between Inteli and Nova Escola, aims to support public school teachers in diagnosing student learning and recommending pedagogical content. Athena is a web application that manages classes, assessments, and students, identifying difficulties through assessment data and providing charts and lesson plans for monitoring and recommendations.
